item.title: Tilix
item.author: Author
item.description: Tilix is an advanced GTK3 tiling terminal emulator.

item.title: Command prompt
item.author: Author
item.description: Command prompt tools to enhance your terminal experience.

item.title: Pacman-based package management and Arch User Repository
item.author: Author
item.description: The Arch User Repository (AUR) hosts PKGBUILDs (instructions to download and build a package) contributed by the community. Similar to Ubuntu PPAs, but on steriod.

item.title: Quotes from Games
item.author: Author
item.description: Nothing is true, everything is permitted. - Assassin’s creed

item.title: Quotes Movies
item.author: Author
item.description: People are selfish; they always want others to do the things they failed to do themselves. - Parasite (2019) Movie Never hate your enemies. It affects your judgment. - Michael Corleone, The Godfather Without sacrifice, there can be no victory. - Transformers

item.title: Warhammer Quotes
item.author: Author
item.description: Innocence proves nothing. There is no such thing as innocence, only degrees of guilt. An open mind is like a fortress with its gates unbarred and unguarded. I have no right to let them live. - Exterminatus No sacrifice is too great, no treachery too small. - Inqusitor Horst Even a man who has nothing can still offer his life. Only in death does duty end. Hope is the first step on the road to disappointment.

item.title: Quotes about Hope
item.author: Author
item.description: Hope in reality is the worst of all evils because it prolongs the torments of man. â€• Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Fcitx 5
item.author: Author
item.description: Fcitx1 is a lightweight input method framework aimed at providing environment independent language support for Linux. The development effort is mainly on the new version 52.
